description: Jessy, a museum curator, has acquired 10 rare artifacts. She may entrust some/all artifacts to Bob, an experienced restorer, to enhance their historical value. Each restored artifact triples its exhibition appeal. Once restored, Bob decides how many artifacts to return for the museum's showcase.

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of the restored artifacts to the curator
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of the restored artifacts to the curator
